hints.content:
$\pink8$ has $\blue0$ tens and $\pink8$ ones.

$\blue2\pink5$ has $\blue2$ tens and $\pink5$ ones.  

$\blue7\pink6$ has $\blue7$ tens and $\pink6$ ones.

$\blue9\pink9$ has $\blue9$ tens and $\pink9$ ones.

The least number is $8$ because it has no tens.

The greatest number is $99$ because it has $9$ tens and $9$ ones.
Here are the numbers in order from least to greatest: $8$, $25$, $76$, $99$.
